{"rule":"EN_UNPAIRED_QUOTES","sentence":"^\\QThese regions, labelled `Full Support', are sections of genomic sequence where all three gene finders agree that a gene is present in some form.\\E$"}
{"rule":"EN_UNPAIRED_QUOTES","sentence":"^\\QRegions that have support from more than one gene finder, but not all, are labelled regions with `Partial Support'.\\E$"}
{"rule":"EN_UNPAIRED_QUOTES","sentence":"^\\QRegions with supporting predictions from all gene finders included in this analysis are labelled with `Full Support' and colored red.\\E$"}
{"rule":"EN_UNPAIRED_QUOTES","sentence":"^\\QRegions labelled with `Partial Support' (turquoise) are regions with supporting gene predictions from two gene finders.\\E$"}
